column4: after installing ubuntu 8.04 on my asus f6a, vista is unable to boot and runs in recovery mode. vistas recovery mode ereases the ubuntu partitions. can someonetellme what i should do ?
can someone tell me why vista ereases my linux partitions????
- I read about that happening in a tech news article --- search it out on Google
- I think its a new "improvement" to the OS
